post.text: Los comentarios de Trump acerca de la herencia mexicana del juez Curiel son repugnantes, hasta otros republicanos est√°n ofendidos.

comment.author: Shannon
comment.text: wow! Can't wait for the election...trump is going to CRUSH Hillary. I say this not as an insult, nor to provoke an argument. its just an observation, that is all. she is getting 3.1k likes on a video and trump is getting 61k 120k etc etc etc. I'm not saying I dislike like her on a political level, but on a personal one due to the Benghazi victims. I only checked her site to see how much we were winning I'm I am pleasently surprised :)

replies.author: Abbey
replies.text: Hilary will CRUSH him in the debates! He's no match for her genius !

replies.author: Devyn
replies.text: There are folks that will take your bet - put money on it if you're so sure. Suggest you not wager the rent.
